tooltip.fpshud.pollingRate: The rate at which the FPS are polled (ms) - Cannot be over one of the refresh fields
tooltip.fpshud.mainUpdateInterval: Main FPS display refresh rate (ms) - Cannot be under polling rate
tooltip.fpshud.avrUpdateInterval: Average FPS display refresh rate (ms) - Cannot be under polling rate
tooltip.fpshud.maxUpdateInterval: Maximum FPS display refresh rate (ms) - Cannot be under polling rate
tooltip.fpshud.minUpdateInterval: Minimum FPS display refresh rate (ms) - Cannot be under polling rate
tooltip.fpshud.toggleHUD: Enable or disable the entire HUD
tooltip.fpshud.textColor: Color of the HUD text (hex format)
tooltip.fpshud.shadow: Enable or disable HUD text shadow
tooltip.fpshud.precision: Number of decimal points for FPS values
tooltip.fpshud.beforeFps: Text displayed before the FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.afterFps: Text displayed after the FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.beforeAvr: Text displayed before the average FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.afterAvr: Text displayed after the average FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.beforeMax: Text displayed before the max FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.afterMax: Text displayed after the max FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.beforeMin: Text displayed before the min FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.afterMin: Text displayed after the min FPS value
tooltip.fpshud.separator: Text used to separate different FPS values
